column1: Average weather departures from normal (relative to 1970 onward) from Bear Creek Reservoir and Shawnigan Lake weather stations

column5: the 4.5 months prior to the start of the project, it was 1.6 degrees warmer and 38 % drier than normal
2018 wet season (October 2018 - April 2019) was 0.5 degrees warmer and 26 % drier than normal
2019 dry season (May - Oct) was 0.9 degrees warmer and 1 % wetter than normal
2019 wet season was 0.38 degrees warmer and 5 % drier than normal, with one extreme wet anomaly
overall, the study period was 0.6 degrees warmer and 10% drier than normal
